languages.text: When frozen {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is inactive, self-destruct protocol becomes active: the servitor will explode at the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда ледяная {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} неактивна, действует протокол самоуничтожения: в конце своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} сервитор взрывается.

traits.locale_text: When the Frozen Armour is down, Self-Destruct Protocol is launched: if a servitor has an enemy nearby, that servitor will explode at the end of its turn.
When frozen armour is inactive, self-destruct protocol becomes active: the servitor will explode at the end of its turn.
When frozen {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is inactive, self-destruct protocol becomes active: the servitor will explode at the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
When frozen {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is inactive, self-destruct protocol becomes active: the servitor will explode at the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: 当“冰冻{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}”效果未激活时，此机仆会激活自毁协议，在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时自爆。
languages.original_text: When frozen {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is inactive, self-destruct protocol becomes active: the servitor will explode at the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当“冰冻护甲”效果未激活时，此奴工会激活自毁协议，在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时自爆。{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}{/g}

languages.text: 凍結{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が発動していない時、自爆プロトコルが発動し、その{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時にサーヴィターが爆発する。
languages.original_text: When frozen {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is inactive, self-destruct protocol becomes active: the servitor will explode at the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 凍結{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}が発動していない時、自己破壊プロトコルが発動し、その{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時にサーヴィターが爆発する。

languages.text: Cuando {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} helada no está activa, se activa protocolo de autodestrucción: el servidor explotará al final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: When frozen {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is inactive, self-destruct protocol becomes active: the servitor will explode at the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} helada no está activa, se activa protocolo de autodestrucción: el servidor explotará al final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: Когда ледяная {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} неактивна, действует протокол самоуничтожения: в конце своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} сервитор взрывается.
languages.original_text: When frozen {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is inactive, self-destruct protocol becomes active: the servitor will explode at the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда ледяная {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броня{/g} неактивна, действует протокол саморазрушения: в конце своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} сервитор взрывается.
Когда ледяная {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броня{/g} неактивна, действует протокол саморазрушения: в конце своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} сервитор взрывается.

languages.text: Wenn die gefrorene {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} inaktiv ist, wird das Selbstzerstörungsprotokoll aktiviert und Servitor explodiert am Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g}.
languages.original_text: When frozen {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is inactive, self-destruct protocol becomes active: the servitor will explode at the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn die gefrorene {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} inaktiv ist, wird das Selbstzerstörungsprotokoll aktiv: Der Servitor explodiert am Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsque la capacité {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} gelée est inactive, le protocole d'autodestruction s'active et le servitor explose à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
languages.original_text: When frozen {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is inactive, self-destruct protocol becomes active: the servitor will explode at the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque la capacité {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Armure{/g} Gelée est inactive, le protocole d'autodestruction s'active : le servitor explose à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.

languages.text: Donmuş {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} etkin değilken kendini imha protokolü etkinleşir ve hizmetör, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sona erdiğinde patlar.
